. In March, when the New York Times reported on the fracturing relationship between Apple and Google, Steve Jobs declined to comment. Eric Schmidt , meanwhile, was anything but cold, calculating, and distant. I continue to believe, as many do, that Steve Jobs is the best CEO in the world today, and I admire Apple and Steve Jobs enormously, Eric Schmidt declared.
